name: reawaken
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make you notice, feel, or remember a wish, interest, or emotion again : High street spending increased sharply last month, reawakening fears of higher interest rates. Writing the book reawakened some bad memories. He hopes the musical will reawaken the public to his talents. Synonym
rekindle
More examplesFewer examplesThe performance aims to reawaken our sense of wonder at the natural world.Meeting her again on the beach reawakened his desire.Reading this novel has reawakened my love of books.
